His madness makes him true. He says only what he believes.
translation.de: Sein Irrsinn sorgt dafür. Er sagt nur, was er glaubt.

translation.en: That is why he is loved.
The assassin then was sent by your brother.
translation.de: Dann schickte Euer Bruder den Mörder.

translation.en: -My brother? -Mm-hmm. My brother was too stupid to conjure such a plan.
translation.de: Mein Bruder war zu dumm für so einen Plan.

translation.en: What was your true reason? Did you know of the ball he sent?
translation.de: -Was war der wahre Grund? -Wisst Ihr von der Kugel, die er schickte?

translation.en: The ball he sent to me?
translation.de: Die Kugel, die er mir schickte?

translation.en: A ball?
He sent to you...
translation.de: Er hat euch eine Kugel geschickt?

translation.en: -a ball? -Why should you question my intent?
translation.de: Er hat euch eine Kugel geschickt? Wieso stellt Ihr meine Absicht infrage?

translation.en: Your father's rule is illegitimate. He has no right claim to his throne.
translation.de: Die Herrschaft Eures Vaters ist illegitim.

translation.en: All monarchy is illegitimate.
You yourself are the son of a usurper.
translation.de: Ihr seid der Sohn eines Thronräubers.

translation.en: It would seem that you have no explanation for what you have done.
translation.de: Wie es scheint, habt Ihr keine Erklärung für Euer Tun.

translation.en: You have shed the blood of so many Christian souls, and yet...
translation.de: Ihr habt das Blut vieler Christenseelen vergossen...

translation.en: before me now, all I see is a...
translation.de: ...aber vor mir sehe ich hier lediglich

translation.en: young and vain and foolish man so easily riled.
translation.de: einen jungen, eitlen, dummen Mann, der leicht erzürnbar ist.

translation.en: So easily beguiled.
I must leave you now.
[William] Gentle.
We must be sure to revel in this day, my friend.
translation.de: Wir sollten diesen Tag genießen, mein Freund.

translation.en: A crowd has gathered in honor of our victory.
translation.de: Eine Menge hat sich versammelt, um unseren Sieg zu ehren.

translation.en: These are the rare moments for which a king truly lives, I would imagine.
translation.de: Das sind seltene Momente, für die ein König wohl lebt.

translation.en: In all my preoccupation, I have... neglected to ask after your family.
translation.de: Ich war so beschäftigt, dass ich nicht nach Eurer Familie fragte.

translation.en: Your preoccupations are hardly trifling.
translation.de: Ihr hattet ja auch sehr wichtige Dinge zu tun.

translation.en: You have two sons.
I do.
[King Henry V] And...
your wife minds your estate in your absence.
translation.de: Eure Frau kümmert sich um Euer Heim.

translation.en: [William] She does.
Yours is sheep.
You're a man of wool.
As was my father before me.
How many head?
At last count, some 4,000. Mostly Dorset Horns.
translation.de: Bei der letzten Zählung 4000. Hauptsächlich Dorset Horns.

translation.en: How much land have you?
To be true, I'm not...
wholly certain, but...
but many... many hundreds of beautiful, beautiful acres.
What lands in France have you now annexed?
translation.de: Welche Gebiete in Frankreich habt Ihr annektiert?

translation.en: [William] Stop.
Now that France is ours, how much of her land is now yours?
translation.de: Jetzt, wo Frankreich unser ist, wie viel vom Land gehört Euch?

translation.en: Oh, well...
That has yet to be determined. [chuckles]
Your conquest is so recent.
-Why do you ask this question-- -Stay up there.
-Hmm? -Stay up there.
How did my assassin come to you?
translation.de: Wie ist mein Mörder zu Euch gekommen?

translation.en: I fail to remember the moment.
Remedy this failure.
So much has happened in the intervening months.
translation.de: Es ist inzwischen so viel passiert.

translation.en: An event as pivotal as this one
should be amply equipped to penetrate the fog of time elapsed.
translation.de: sollte in der Lage sein, den Gedankennebel zu durchdringen.

translation.en: No?
Of course.
Let me recall.
Was it in the street?
Did he come to you in the street?
translation.de: Kam er auf der Straße zu Euch?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, it was in the street.
translation.de: Ja, es war auf der Straße.

translation.en: He approached me... [inhales] most unusually.
translation.de: Er hat sich mir sehr ungewöhnlich genähert.

translation.en: My liege, please, tell me the cause of this concern.
translation.de: Mein Herr, sagt, worum es geht.

translation.en: Stay up there.
Stay up there.
Did he know your name?
I don't believe he did.
How, then, did he know who you were to approach?
translation.de: Woher wusste er dann, dass Ihr es wart?

translation.en: The memory is returning.
He surrendered himself to palace guards
translation.de: Er meldete sich bei den Palastwachen,

translation.en: and the matter was brought to my attention. I was taken to him.
translation.de: man benachrichtigte mich und brachte mich zu ihm.

translation.en: So, he did not come to you in the street. No. No, it was not in the street. Forgive me.
translation.de: -Es war also nicht auf der Straße. -Nein. Verzeiht.

translation.en: I was summoned to his cell.
translation.de: Ich wurde zu seiner Zelle gerufen.

translation.en: Has a problem arisen...
Hal?
Yes. A problem has arisen.
And it wobbles before me now on its silly little stool
translation.de: Und es wackelt vor mir auf einem albernen Hocker

translation.en: -at mine own elevation. -I'm afraid I don't understand.
-Please, please, stop this charade. -Sincerely, I do not understand.
translation.de: -Schluss mit der Farce! -Ich verstehe wirklich nicht.

translation.en: [yells] Stop the fucking charade! Stop it!
[yells] I have given you what you wanted, boy!
translation.de: Ich habe Euch gegeben, was Ihr wolltet, Junge!

translation.en: Have I not?!
You wanted peace. [yells] Did you not?!
This is how peace is forged.
It is forged in victory.
Listen.
That is the sound of peace.
translation.de: Das ist der Klang des Friedens.

translation.en: That is the sound of your peace.
That is the sound of your greatness.
I ask nothing of you...
only that you will always speak to me clear and true.
translation.de: ...außer, dass Ihr mir immer die Wahrheit sagt.

translation.en: Always.
Will you promise me only that?
-[crowd] Long live the King! -I will.
[man] King Henry!
[crowd] King Henry!
